plot outline: A newly married couple Mohini and Harsha, move into a newly built community. They are oblivious to the presence of a spirit in their new home till a little child from a neighbour's family tells them that he was having conversations with someone in their house. At first they dismiss it as the imaginative mind of a child talking but later the spirit makes its presence felt and assaults Mohini. The couple decide to leave the haunted house but circumstances force them to spend one last night there.
title: Avunu
plot: The spirit of a serial rapist who's body is chopped into tiny pieces, mixed into concrete that's used to build a house, haunts it and terrorises the newly weds who move in there.

A newly married couple Mohini and Harsha, move into a newly built community. They are oblivious to the presence of a spirit in their new home till a little child from a neighbour's family tells them that he was having conversations with someone in their house. At first they dismiss it as the imaginative mind of a child talking but later the spirit makes its presence felt and assaults Mohini. The couple decide to leave the haunted house but circumstances force them to spend one last night there.::Deepak Alone
